required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Study of HA121-28 in Patients With Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer
clinical_study.official_title: A Single-Arm, Multi-Centre, Open-Label Phase II Study of HA121-28 in Patients With RET Fusion-Positive Advanced Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer

lead_sponsor.agency: CSPC ZhongQi Pharmaceutical Technology Co., Ltd.

clinical_study.source: CSPC ZhongQi Pharmaceutical Technology Co., Ltd.

brief_summary.textblock: This study is a multicenter, open-label, single-arm phase II study to evaluate efficacy and safety of HA121-28 tablets in patients with rearranged during transfection (RET) fusion-positive advanced non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC).

primary_outcome.description: The percentage of patients who achieve a complete response (CR) or partial response (PR) evaluated by Independent Review Committee (IRC) according to RECIST 1.1.

secondary_outcome.description: The percentage of patients who achieve a CR or PR evaluated by investigator according to RECIST 1.1.
Time from date of the first dose to date of recorded disease progression or death, whichever occurs first.
Time from date of the first dose to date of death from any cause.
The percentage of patients who achieve a CR, PR or stable disease (SD) evaluated by IRC.
Time from first documented response (CR or PR, whichever occurs first, evaluated by IRC) to date of disease progression or death due to any cause, whichever occurs first.

secondary_outcome.measure: Incidence of treatment-related adverse events (AEs) and serious adverse events (SAEs).
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 28 days after the last administration of HA121-28
secondary_outcome.description: The AEs and SAEs will be assessed according to the National Cancer Institute (NCI) CTCAE v5.0.

arm_group.description: Patients will receive HA121-28 tablets at 600 mg once daily (QD) for 21 days on a 28-day treatment cycle.

intervention.description: HA121-28 tablet, 600 mg, po, QD×21 days, every 4 weeks (28 days)
